LogbackLogMessenger - Class in org.concordion.ext
Configures a OutputStreamAppender to store new log messages from Logback for delivery to LoggingTooltipExtension
LogbackLogMessenger(String, Level, boolean) - Constructor for class org.concordion.ext.LogbackLogMessenger
Configures loggers to store new messages.
LogbackLogMessenger(String, Level, boolean, String) - Constructor for class org.concordion.ext.LogbackLogMessenger
Configures loggers to store new messages.
LoggingFormatterExtension - Class in org.concordion.ext
Formats the footer of the Concordion specification to show a link to the log file that has been created for this test.

By default this link leads to a log file viewer which attempts to format the log file for easier reading.
LoggingFormatterExtension() - Constructor for class org.concordion.ext.LoggingFormatterExtension
Constructor - defaults to using LogbackAdaptor.
LoggingFormatterExtension(ILoggingAdaptor) - Constructor for class org.concordion.ext.LoggingFormatterExtension
Constructor.
